content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were coming down from moncton and took the old shediac rd. then i suddenly started to see a light in the sky that seems like an helicopter or some sort. then the closer we got, the more it would hover down. when we got to the stop sign at the end of that road, it was really close and big that we could even see the machines inside, but no aliens or humans... i don't know what it was, i really think it was a ufo, because that's what it seems like. there was a car behind us, so i had to continue, but then turned around not far and there was nothing. it was no where to be found, no sign.

if someone saw the same, please respond !
content.summary: Old shediac rd/shediac stop (garages)

content.detailedDescription: I got to oklahoma the evening right after the moore tornado of monday, may 20, 2013 for my first job in the wind industry. i showed up for work (as a subcontractor) at the wind farm in minco, grady county. weather wasn't good and no work could be done as it was expected to get worst. just before leaving the site that morning, i snapped a picture of the cloud formations with my cellphone, as those are not seen where i'm from. i didn't see anything unusual other than the cloud formations and we could hear some thunder in the distance. recently, while reviewing the image, noticed what i first thought was a helicopter but upon closer inspection couldn't make out either a main rotor or tail rotor. showing the image to a buddy of mine, noticed a second and third objects in the image. it's unfortunate that back then my cellphone camera was only 5 mp. i would like mufon to review the image and comment on what you may find.
content.summary: Taking picture of bad weather, cloud formations. ufos appeared in image while reviewing.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in by backyard just past midnight when a blue/white glowing orb appeared almost directly above me.The size and proximity to the ground was absoloutly shocking.So was the bright light that appeared to be what it was made up of.There were no clouds at all in the sky it was a clear night.All of a sudden it was there above me and within a couple seconds it was moving west and out of sight as fast as anything i've ever seen in my life.This direction is commonplace for regular aircraft as it's the route most commercial airliners go towards the airport,however this was absoloutly not an aircraft.It made no sound whatsoever,appeared out of nowhere and moved at a speed i couldn't hope to explain.I have no physical evidence as it happened so quickly but like many others i've heard on interviews and television shows(which i would watch with interest but skepticism)all i can say is that i know what i saw with 100% conviction and something il never forget until the day i die.The physical makeup of the area is that of a small forrest area with a creek bordering a large river a couple blocks away which leads to the ocean not far away.
content.summary: I saw a blue/white glowing orb appear almost directly above then moved in a straight line very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed on dec 3rd at 3:31 pm a chrome shining object in north east heading north west then zig zagded north south, then, north west then north by due north and then suddenly dissipated. it was not an airplane. it shined and looked like a zorrow type hat shaped shining object, slowly observing the landscape, i would guess it was aprox.900 ft. and it seemed to know that i was looking at it, pulled over to watch it as i was driving. i watched it for about 7-10 minutes, as it moved and zigzagged slowly it finally disappeared north by dead north. i` am guessing it was 10 miles away. i` am 68 yrs old and have seen them trough out my life with 2-3 witnesses alot of my life. about a month ago i tripped and caught my big toe on my right foot.It got infected, was given anti biotic and an x ray shows a 6mm object in my second digit in my big toe. is it an implant? doctor says its been there a long time? i have live transplant and diabetes and dr. will not remove it, because of an infection risk! ive seen ufo`s all my life,mostly in my young life. thanks paul
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shined like chrome,slowly headin nw then slowly zigzazed,moved nn by n

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 4am on christmas morning & i'd just woken up on the sofa - i had been waiting on my partner coming home from work (he works as a chef, so is often home late -even later when he goes to the pub after! but anyway...)  i went out onto the balcony for a smoke before getting ready for bed. as soon as i went out i noticed a strange light over port philip bay, bright red & stationary in the sky, i have no idea how long it had been there for. it started to drift upwards at a 30-45 degree angle - almost like a ballon drifting in the wind & i even thought - must be some folks down on the beach with chinese lanterns but then it stopped & darted horizontally to the left (to trace its pattern it looked like 7) then it would stop, drop in height & performed other manoeuvres that i've never seen before (i've lived in this apartment for 2 years & regularly watch the planes on their flight paths, helicopters, etc - i know what is a normal occurrence & what is not) the lights also changed from red to white, not flashing, it was always solid colour for a few minutes then would change. every time it performed a fast movement, there was a delay before you heard it - like a jet. it was about 25 degrees that night,the sky was clear, the air was warm, calm & silent but for the occasional woooooosh that broke through the stillness. it was completely bizarre - i sat for about 15 mins absolutely mesmerised watching it - too scared that if i left to go grab a camera i would miss the 'big moment' of it shooting up into the sky. that moment never came - it just eventually dropped out of my line of sight & never reappeared. needless to say, i completely regret not managing to get any of it on film but i can remember it all clear as day - i'll never forget it.

i've always had an open mind to ufo's & things of that nature, but did have a slight 'i'd have to see it to believe it' mentality. and i really believe that what i saw that night was a ufo (also making me think twice about the 'shooting star' i saw over a year ago). i started looking for answers & am in the middle of watching sirius disclosure when they mentioned your website & i had to stop watching & post about what i saw. thank you for providing this space where people can share their experiences.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white/red light over port philip bay

content.detailedDescription: I saw it for about 45 mins on jan. 4th  & finally stopped & took pics at 11:00pm. i kept noticing it in the sky while driving around doing deliveries... so i was in several places around the metro area during this time. i was compelled to stop & grab my camera after not getting a good shot with my phone.  it was foggy that night & you can't see the city well in the photo, but the object appeared to be over downtown denver. from my perspective south of the city it looked like it was between mile high stadium & the buildings of downtown.
content.summary: Wittnessed hovering over what seemed to be downtown denver

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were outside of my house early in the morning watching the sky for shooting stars and u.F.O.S. we have both noticed strange things in the sky since the perseid meteor shower in summer 2016. there were many satellites visible all night long. i took a bright flashlight and started to shine it at things i saw in the sky. around 5 a.M. our other friend and his girlfriend arrived from work. while we were talking i saw what i thought was another satellite. it came from the south and stayed on one path until i shined my light on it. i shined it over and over and it turned around back towards us. my friends girlfriend jokingly told me to stop trying to get abducted! we were all commenting how satellites don't move like that!When it was almost directly above us it stopped completely. i turned my light on and off and the "satellite" got brighter and dim again, like it was using a dimmer switch for a light. it seemed to respond to my light,but who knows.I would shine it, it would flash back. i did this 2 or 3 more times until it started moving and looking just like a satellite again until it dissapeared over the treeline. we all thought it was a cool experience but none of us were shocked by it. almost any clear night we see bizarre things above my place. i chose to tell this because its the most witnesses i've had at one time. i've had more experiences at the same location, one of which is so crazy sounding to most people i won't even tell my friends because i believe they will think i am mentally-ill. it had me questioning my own sanity.
content.summary: Shined light at a "satellite." it stopped overhead and seemed to react to my light.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash behind my home. it is very dark where we store our garbage cans, away from city lights. for some reason, i decided to look at the sky. as i look directly to my south, there appeared what looked like a normal star constellation except all of the stars were noticeably blue. it looked odd and out of place. i asked my wife to come look. when she saw them, i asked her, "why are they all blue". she said, "i don't know". at that moment all of the orbs(?) went dark or invisible, all of them. it seemed as if they all just blinked out of existence. my wife did witness this as well.
content.summary: Blue lights appearing like a constellation, they didn't move, then instantly went dark or invisible

content.detailedDescription: Space station live cam object unknown

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from tampa with a friend when we noticed huge glowing object to the west. it went over our car. we pulled over to get out. by then it had traveled quiteva distance and had changed direction now heading south. we watched a few minutes until it was out of sight. it made no sound. at one point it stopped traveling and appeared to be heading back our direction then ssemed to again change directions and continue south. it was unnerving.We drove around several miles but did not see it again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed bright orange red craft heading over craft. by timecwe git out it had changed directions.

content.detailedDescription: i was six years old or so woke up with a very bright penetrating late through the walls. that was the first night, second night sleeping i woke, and penetrating light went through the walls and windows went from one window to mine next thing i know the bright light stops and i'm not in bedroom anymore. i woke up on the ship to aliens or whatever they were. communicating with me telepathically is the only way i can describe it. if you want to know more please get back to me and bothering my whole life. since i was a kid and still to this day i would like to talk to somebody that might know something about it and about what i'm going through. i was also told never ever to talk about it.Where my life would not be the same if i told anybody but now i'm doing it anyway. please contact i don't want anybody to know about conversation please.  there is still a lot more  i haven't mentioned in this and i will explain more but i can talk to somebody also do not want anyone else to know about this as i think people will think i'm crazy. exclamation
content.summary: Blinding light source through bedroom window twice on 2nd night i was taken through ceiling and brought aboard unknown ship,only remember inside of ship !

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was 6 pm, i was sitting outside having a smoke. it was dark, and cloud cover. i always try to star gaze but it was too cloudy to see any stars. then out of no where, and exactly where i was looking a white ball of light appeared, grew quite large in size, and took off west at impossible speed. it was far below the cloud cover and didnt seem that far away. no sound. weird maybe, but it seemed it appeared for me only and it was so fast that unless you were looking exactly where i was, i doubt anyone else saw it. so while im here about 3 months ago i was stargazing when some lights started flshing like stars. i kept my gaze there when a red light appeared, grew larger, then blinked out. this was on a clear night and there was just some odd flashes and blinking lights for a minute or so. thats my story and i'm keeping to it!
content.summary: Light (object)? appeared

content.detailedDescription: It was my birthday, and my mother was taking me out to eat. on our way to town, i happen to notice what i thought at first was maybe a helicopter or aircraft. but it had unusually bright white lights, with what appeared to be a red/green flashing lights, kinda like a normal aircraft might have. didn't think to much of it at the time, but kept kinda looking towards it, as it moved slowly. it arrived at the edge of town, just about the time we did, and was hovering low, over trees and houses. about the time we turned to head towards town, it's flight path was heading right for us, so i was like ok, i'll see what it was for sure now, cause it's about to be right over our heads. so i look out the window as it slowly hovered overhead and was dumbfounded by what i saw. it was a triangular shaped craft, unlike anything i have ever seen before. 3 bright white lights at the corners of the craft. red lights towards the center. and orange lighting in various places. it seemed to have orange lit engine like vents towards back end of the craft. it seemed to be dark grey in color, but the whole thing had this translucent blueish aura about it. the encounter was brief, but life changing. i've never seen anything with this level of tech. you could just feel how powerful this thing was. i'm a bit of sci fi fan, and have kinda somewhat believe the possibility of stuff like this existing. the crazy part is, the thing was still in the area on our way home, an hr or so later. though it didn't come close to us again. but seriously, it just made everything i've ever seen, including fantasy, just pale in comparison. i've actually been kinda scared to drive or even go out at night since seeing it. it's really kinda shaken me up. my mother was driving, so she never got a close look at it like i did, unfortunately. and no pictures either. i honestly was so amazed and shocked, i didn't even think to try.
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufo with 3 bright white lights hovered over our car.

content.summary: A object in tehran city and attack military the ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I have never reported this or really mentioned it to people. it happened around 10 years ago i was 16 at the time, but i can picture it perfectly when i close my eyes because it was really wiered to me at the time. 
   i was out with a few of my friends a can remember we were walking down castledyke in barton upon humber and i can remember my friend joe pointing up at the sky. there was an orange orb/ light in the sky. it looked about the size of a basketball from were we were stood, it was really high up in the sky and looked the size of badket ball so it must of been an absolute massive object because airplanes only look like tiny dots when they are high up. it wasn't making any noise that we could hear it was just thete. we observed for around ten miniits then a smaller orange glow dort if dropped away from it l, this "glow" was about half the size of the first "glow" which was still hovering as sorted of dropped/floated down another "glow" was released again about half the size it acted in the same way as the first one. as it dropped/floated down it caught up with the first "glow" that was released and when it was level they both dissapeared in a flash then within a few seconds the first "glow" which they came of also disappeared in a flash. we did mention it to one of my friends parents and they said it would of just been flares and nothing out of the ordinary. so after they had told us that i put it to the back of my mind for some years. but i always new something wasn't right it couldn't of been a flare first of all flares don't release flares and judging by the size of it. if it was that high up and looked the size of a basket ball it must of been a massive object. then the way the two smaller "glows" hovered wasn't natural it was asif the first one slowed down and let the second "glow" catch up with it. then they both disappeared when they were together. then the large object disappeared shortly after. we were amazed and shocked at what we saw i can remember feeling facinated we were coming up with all different things we thought it wad. but even tho we didn't really say to each other i think that we all thought it was something alien we were exited about it as well rushing to scotts parents (another friend who wad there) we rushed in the house all shouting over each other getting exited over what we had seen. i gained a real sense of wonder from what i saw that i have never lost and as i have grown up i have realised that ufo's are not fantasy they are not made up by crazy people like we are told they are 100% real and need investigating . so as i have grown up i have looked at what i saw in a different point of view but still kept it to myself. i can definitely say it wasn't a flare we saw as i have seen one since and its a completely different colour and moved in a completely different way. what i saw was 100% a ufo not a helicopter,plane or jet. i have only told one person what i saw other than my friends parents, i have never spoke about it with the people i saw it with. but as i remember at the time we were all fascinated about the way it behaved. there is an airport nearby humberside airport this is a small airport and i am positive it wasn't anything from there. it was just a large orange "glow" it was very bright it looked like the orange colour of fire. to this day i have never seenvanything like it in the sky. i noticed on the mufon app that i could report a sighting so i did because i new i wouldn't be judged and critised and its not face to face which makes it a lot easier for me. so this is my encounter which is the truth if i was going to lie i would have come up with something a lot more farfetched. if there is anything else please email me. that's everything. 
thankyou creating a platform for myself and others to share our experiences its a good help to tell someone who won't critise you and attack your character and just think you mad. you are doing a wonderful brilliant job. 
you probably hear this a lot but i would appreciate it if thete is any work or research i could help you with. i can look at things with an open mind and with a different perspective which really does help with this phenomenon.
content.summary: A large bright orange glow appeared then it released two smaller orange things they hovered for 5 min the all disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry to my knowledge i have never seen a ufo. however i do have a mystery to me and would love to know the answer. i suppose you would call it a ula (unidentified landing area) :) guessing early to mid 70's my age early teens. dirt road below my house i would ride my motorcycle or horse almost daily. no houses on the dirt road and rarely traveled. heavily wooded on both sides with no clearings. one day i rounded a corner and a bright white area was glowing off of the road about 20-30 feet. i walked up a bank through the trees and saw something i had never seen before. a huge circle maybe 100 feet or more completely flat and covered in pure white sand. i had never seen white sand before. i remember it was so bright it hurt my eyes.  there was no vegetation, no red clay no stick no rock no anything. there was no road no trail going to or from it. my first thought was what the heck did this? how did they do it? where did all the trees go? how did they make the sand so white? i remember the more i thought about it the creepier it felt. i would ride by almost daily for the next few years and red mud was gradually taking back over the white sand. however i do remember that nothing grew there for as long as i lived there which was probably another 10 years. i just recently thought of it again and went back to check on it. it now has vegetation and the circular outline is harder to distinguish but you can still see it. 
one other thing that may or may not be related. i have no memory of my younger years. doctors have told me it was probably due to the trama of losing a sibling and may be. probably a coincidence.
content.summary: Circular area in pine forest appeared overnight consisting of pure white sand

content.detailedDescription: In august me and my friend saw a triangle in the sky. it was hovering evreytime we would speak lights shined on us. he left. but later that night i woke up unable to move. hearing what was like cb chatter. the language was not of any i ever heard i tried to grab my girlfriend but couldnt move or speak i was help less.I saw gray like human being lookin people in q white room i dont know much about the encounters i cant rember. i just remember wking up the.Next day u felt violated. i cry while typing this. for many years cattle around my tennessee mountain home have been mutilated eyea missing there anal regions carved out the farmers say it lighting but several cows have been found this way
content.summary: Mr and a fried witnissed it. i had missing time and have suffered from sleep paralysis. wike up couldnt move tried to speak and grab my girlfriend and couldnt. i heard what sounded like cb chatter and a language i couldnt under stand and saw many human in

content.detailedDescription:
I have had three seperate occasions over the last two months that have become a bit of a burden on my wife and i. after disclosing the information i am going to write about to my family and friends i have been oucasted and ridiculed by almost everyone i know. my first experience was roughly the beginning of december, i have always been a sky watcher especially at night i own a couple telescopes and have always had a fascination with the stars. anyway, early december the sky is crystal clear so naturally i am looking up . one night about one thirty i see a pulsing orb, almost appears to be spinning and disappearing st the same time . it had tentacles at least 6 that were spinning with and against the orb. i could tell it was moving towards me and at its nearest was probably 30 meters from my house and was making a light humming noise/hissing noise . it flew past my house and continued for at least 2 miles until it vanished. the second happened on the night after the night when the moon was to be at its closest to earth in 60 years . the moon was by far the most beautiful moon i had ever seen was. was a insane orange color that i have never seen out of a natural
object and was about  half moon with a pretty good hook in the middle not sure what it is called . anyway that night i was driving home at around 12 and again i saw an or. that was fading in and out of the sky . it appeared to be disappearing. then out of nowhere another two or a appears maybe thirty  and sixty from the original craft perfectly symmetrically spaced in the sky . the all fly in perfect symmetry towards the moon straight at it until they are so close together and so far away that it looked like the flew into the moon. my wife was with me it was the most incredible thing we have ever saw . still think a if it all day every day . has consumed me .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Pulsing orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was setting on my porch and notice the blinking lights and so i grab my camera and my tripod and i did not know what it was until i uploaded it onto my pc. i was excited after i saw it . and even more excited i could set up my tripod up to video the object. and it just was gone after a few mins
content.summary: Blinking lights and crazy movement then hovered

content.detailedDescription:
About 25 years ago, i observed a massive disk. it was all light. 300-500 ft in diameter. glow stick yellow and glow stick green. clear delineation on the top and bottom of the disk, cones on top and bottom, windows/portals. again, it was all light, like s massive glow stick colored saucer. delineation was the light color. clearly defined structure. no sound whatsoever. it moved, stopped, moved again, hovered, moved, hovered, zipped fast, hovered, and then disappeared, as if someone turned the light off. 

my first time saying anything other than to a few close family/friends. have a doctorate degree, and the reception to the few people i've said something to was "you're crazy."  i'm hoping someone else saw this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Full light, glow stick colored, green and yellow, no sound, massive saucer observed, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Awoke in bed about 2-3 am could not move but could clearly see them standing beside my bed, tried to call out to my wife but could not, i was for sure not dreaming i could see the night light in our room and all details in the room not at all like a dream, then it was like i passed out, awoke in the am and asked my wife if she saw anything see said no, when i told her she said it was just a dream, i know it was not.
content.summary: Visitation by 2 small grays and one taller one

content.detailedDescription: Back in 2012, over spring break, i was playing soccer in an indoor/outdoor gym at a campground.I started to hear strange noises, and suddenly got an odd feeling. the feeling one may get when someone is looking at them, but more intense. at this point i was standing in the middle of the gym, and looked up to see a boy standing about 15 feet outside of them gym (i was looking at him through a screen window). so i looked up and met eyes with this boy. he looked about my age at the time, young, maybe about the age of a pre-teen. his features were very detailed...He had blonde hair, dark eyebrows, sharp facial features, and he was unseasonably tan. the strangest thing, however, is that he appeared to be transparent in a sense. as if he were a hologram. i was shocked, i looked down and a second later i looked back and he was gone. i ran out of the gym to look for him, but he was no wehre to be found. also, the night before it had rained, and the only footprints in the sand were mine and my dogs. so then later on that day my two cousins had came over and i had told them about what had happened at the gym. after that we went to a waterpark, and the boy was there..I made sure to point him out to them. they both had seen him and gave me specific details about what he looked like, and what he was wearing. i had to make sure i wasn't going crazy and just seeing things. the whole time at the waterpark the boy would just stare at me, and wouldn't even swim. he would just sit at the edge of the pool. the reason why i remember this so vividly is becuase of the sense i got from him...It was like some odd connection, i'm not quite sure how to expalin it. the best way i can say it is, it felt the way two magnets feel when you are pulling them away from each other. it was such a strong emotion that i had only felt after leaving the boy. when i think back at such a vivid memory that was, i realize that part of the gym experience simply doesn't add up. i was standing in the middle of the gym, but my view of the boy would have had to be right in front of the window. however, that is impossible to see the boy from where i was actually standing, compared to what my view had to have been. two years after that, i was just about to head out and go snowboarding when i get this familiar, yet strange feeling again. i looked up, and there the boy was. i just remember feeling so overwhelmed by his presence, so compelled. he had unmistakable features: blonde hair, unseasonably tan, dark eyebrows, chizzeled face. he was looking directly at me, and we held eye contact until i had passed him. i tolf my cousins, who were with me once again. after a few hours of snowboarding we had decided we were going to head in; as we were walking back towards the lodge i saw the boy again.He looked directly at me once again, and i was overcome by that same odd feeling. two years later, on new years eve 2016, i was staying with my cousins in a hotel. we were all standing in the lobby, and i was looking down at the floor when i saw these black shoes walking by. i slowly raised up my head and once again, made direct eye contact with this boy, who didn't look so boyish anymore. i was overcome with the same familiar odd feeling. i wanted to run after him and try to talk to him, but i couldn't because he had walked into an employees only area, strangely enough. then that night in the hotel room i was having a hard time sleeping. i remember waking up, and seeing someone standing at the end of the other bed (the bed closest to the wall, mine was close to the window) i looked around and everyone was laying down asleep. i couldn't make out the features becuase the room was dark, but this persons build looked exactly like the boy's... i had looked back up at this person, and saw him walk in front of the door, but instead of opening it, he just disapeared... now, this doesn't quite add up because from where i was compared to my view the second time i looked up, it wouldn't quite make sense, because my second view would have had to be from the end of my bed, but i was still laying down where i had originally been, and you cannot see the door or even the short hallway leading to the door because of the wall. this made me think back to my experience at the gym, becasue something very similar had happened there as well. it may be easy for one to simply address these are mere coincidences, but my first experience at the gym, and the feeling i get when i am near him is unexplainable. strangley enough, i have many of the symptons of an abductee, and have seen my fair share of ufos. it just makes me wonder if this boy has something to do with it.
content.summary: I did not see an alien space craft. however, i saw a boy that looked like he was human, but appeared to be transparent. he had unseasonably tan skin, blonde hair, sharp facial features, and dark eyebrows.

content.detailedDescription: I was sat on bench facing a wall with friends waiting for taxi and talking. when i noticed the wall in font of me light up i turned around quickly thinking it was police helicopter search lights. i instantly thought ufo. it was brighter then the moon! was like day light while its bolting past. done the distance of the sky in 5 seconds at most. i was terrified afterwards started walking home couldn't stop looking at the sky checking if it came back. it disappeared at high speed
content.summary: I saw everything light up from behind me, turned around to see a light bolting across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching dog out in yard after dark when i notices a bright mercury looking light in the south east sky. i knew it to be other than a plane
l since it was still and there were planes in the air also with a dimmer light and moving or flying. i watched it for awhile because it was unusual, then i decided to take pictures with my phone. it lingered in place for approximately 
  40 min that i know of 
and then completely disappeared.
content.summary: Brighter than plane lights --hovering
